00080 void DisplayCoverOfSelectedGridNo( )
00081 {
00082       INT16 sGridNo;
00083       INT8  bStance;
00084 
00085       GetMouseMapPos( &sGridNo );
00086 
00087       //Only allowed in if there is someone selected
00088       if( gusSelectedSoldier == NOBODY )
00089       {
00090             return;
00091       }
00092 
00093       //if the cursor is in a the tactical map
00094       if( sGridNo != NOWHERE && sGridNo != 0 )
00095       {
00096             bStance = GetCurrentMercForDisplayCoverStance();
00097 
00098             //if the gridno is different then the last one that was displayed
00099             if( sGridNo != gsLastCoverGridNo || 
00100                         gbLastStance != bStance || 
00101                         MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->sGridNo != gsLastSoldierGridNo )
00102             {
00103                   //if the cover is currently being displayed
00104                   if( gsLastCoverGridNo != NOWHERE || gbLastStance != -1 || gsLastSoldierGridNo != NOWHERE )
00105                   {
00106                         //remove the gridnos
00107                         RemoveCoverOfSelectedGridNo();
00108                   }
00109                   else
00110                   {
00111                         //if it is the first time in here
00112 
00113                         //pop up a message to say we are in the display cover routine
00114 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00115                         {
00116                               CHAR16      zString[512];
00117                               swprintf( zString, L"%s, (%d)", zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__DISPLAY_COVER ], gGameSettings.ubSizeOfDisplayCover );
00118                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, zString );
00119                         }
00120 #else
00121                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__DISPLAY_COVER ] );
00122 #endif
00123 
00124                         //increment the display cover counter ( just seeing how many times people use it )
00125                         //gJa25SaveStruct.uiDisplayCoverCounter++;
00126                   }
00127 
00128                   gbLastStance = bStance;
00129                   gsLastCoverGridNo = sGridNo;
00130                   gsLastSoldierGridNo = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->sGridNo;
00131 
00132                   //Fill the array of gridno and cover values
00133                   CalculateCoverInRadiusAroundGridno( sGridNo, gGameSettings.ubSizeOfDisplayCover );
00134 
00135                   //Add the graphics to each gridno
00136                   AddCoverTileToEachGridNo();
00137 
00138                   // Re-render the scene!
00139                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00140             }
00141       }
00142 }
00143 
00144 void AddCoverTileToEachGridNo()
00145 {
00146       UINT32 uiCntX, uiCntY;
00147       BOOLEAN fRoof = ( gsInterfaceLevel != I_GROUND_LEVEL );
00148 
00149 
00150       //loop through all the gridnos
00151       for(uiCntY=0; uiCntY<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntY++)
00152       {
00153             for(uiCntX=0; uiCntX<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntX++)
00154             {
00155                   //if there is a valid cover at this gridno
00156                   if( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover != -1 )
00157                   {
00158                         //if the tile provides 80-100% cover
00159                         if( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover <= 100 && 
00160                                     gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover > 80 )
00161                         {
00162                               AddCoverObjectToWorld( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_5, fRoof );
00163                         }
00164 
00165                         //else if the tile provides 60-80% cover
00166                         else if( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover <= 80 && 
00167                                     gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover > 60 )
00168                         {
00169                               AddCoverObjectToWorld( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_4, fRoof );
00170                         }
00171 
00172                         //else if the tile provides 40-60% cover
00173                         else if( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover <= 60 && 
00174                                     gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover > 40 )
00175                         {
00176                               AddCoverObjectToWorld( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_3, fRoof );
00177                         }
00178 
00179                         //else if the tile provides 20-40% cover
00180                         else if( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover <= 40 && 
00181                                     gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover > 20 )
00182                         {
00183                               AddCoverObjectToWorld( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_2, fRoof );
00184                         }
00185 
00186                         //else if the tile provides 0-20% cover
00187                         else if( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover <= 20 && 
00188                                     gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover >= 0 )
00189                         {
00190                               AddCoverObjectToWorld( gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_1, fRoof );
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         //should never get in here
00194                         else
00195                         {
00196                               Assert( 0 );
00197                         }
00198                   }
00199             }
00200       }
00201 }

00203 void RemoveCoverOfSelectedGridNo()
00204 {
00205       UINT32 uiCntX, uiCntY;
00206       BOOLEAN fRoof = ( gsInterfaceLevel != I_GROUND_LEVEL );
00207 
00208 
00209       if( gsLastCoverGridNo == NOWHERE )
00210       {
00211             return;
00212       }
00213 
00214       //loop through all the gridnos
00215       for(uiCntY=0; uiCntY<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntY++)
00216       {
00217             for(uiCntX=0; uiCntX<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntX++)

00240                                     gCoverRadius[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bCover > 40 )

00276 
00277 void CalculateCoverInRadiusAroundGridno( INT16 sTargetGridNo, INT8      bSearchRange )
00278 {
00279       INT16 sMaxLeft, sMaxRight, sMaxUp, sMaxDown, sXOffset, sYOffset;
00280       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier=NULL;
00281       INT16 sGridNo;
00282       INT16 sCounterX, sCounterY;
00283       UINT8 ubID;
00284       INT8 bStance;
00285 //    BOOLEAN fRoof;
00286 
00287       //clear out the array first
00288 //    memset( gCoverRadius, -1, DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE * DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE );
00289       //loop through all the gridnos that we are interested in
00290       for (sCounterY = 0; sCounterY < DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE; sCounterY++)
00291       {
00292             for (sCounterX = 0; sCounterX < DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE; sCounterX++)
00293             {
00294                   gCoverRadius[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].sGridNo = -1;
00295                   gCoverRadius[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].bCover = -1;
00296             }
00297       }
00298 
00299       if( bSearchRange > ( DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE / 2 ) )
00300             bSearchRange = ( DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE / 2 );
00301 
00302       // determine maximum horizontal limits
00303       sMaxLeft  = min( bSearchRange,( sTargetGridNo % MAXCOL ));
00304       sMaxRight = min( bSearchRange,MAXCOL - (( sTargetGridNo % MAXCOL ) + 1));
00305 
00306       // determine maximum vertical limits
00307       sMaxUp   = min( bSearchRange,( sTargetGridNo / MAXROW ));
00308       sMaxDown = min( bSearchRange,MAXROW - (( sTargetGridNo / MAXROW ) + 1));
00309 
00310 
00311       //Find out which tiles around the location are reachable
00312       LocalReachableTest( sTargetGridNo, bSearchRange );
00313 
00314       pSoldier = GetCurrentMercForDisplayCover();
00315 
00316       sCounterX = sCounterY = 0;
00317 
00318       //Determine the stance to use
00319       bStance = GetCurrentMercForDisplayCoverStance();
00320 
00321       //loop through all the gridnos that we are interested in
00322       for (sYOffset = -sMaxUp; sYOffset <= sMaxDown; sYOffset++)
00323       {
00324             for (sXOffset = -sMaxLeft; sXOffset <= sMaxRight; sXOffset++)
00325             {
00326                   sGridNo = sTargetGridNo + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
00327 
00328                   //record the gridno
00329                   gCoverRadius[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].sGridNo = sGridNo;
00330 
00331 /*
00332                   fRoof = FALSE;
00333 
00334                   //is there a roof above this gridno
00335                   if( FlatRoofAboveGridNo( sGridNo ) )
00336                   {
00337                         if( IsTheRoofVisible( sGridNo ) )
00338                         {
00339                               fRoof = TRUE;
00340                         }
00341                   }
00342 */
00343                   //if the gridno is NOT on screen
00344                   if( !GridNoOnScreen( sGridNo ) )
00345                   {
00346                         continue;
00347                   }
00348 
00349                   //if we are to display cover for the roofs, and there is a roof above us
00350                   if( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL && !FlatRoofAboveGridNo( sGridNo ) )
00351                   {
00352                         continue;
00353                   }
00354 
00355                   //if the gridno cant be reached
00356                   if ( !(gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REACHABLE) )
00357                   {
00358                         //skip to the next gridno
00359                         sCounterX++;
00360                         continue;
00361                   }
00362 
00363                   // if someone (visible) is there, skip
00364                   //Check both bottom level, and top level
00365                   ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 0 );
00366                   if( ubID == NOBODY )
00367                   {
00368                         ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 1 );
00369                   }
00370                   //if someone is here, and they are an enemy, skip over them
00371                   if ( ubID != NOBODY && Menptr[ ubID ].bVisible == TRUE && Menptr[ ubID ].bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam )
00372                   {
00373                         continue;
00374                   }
00375 
00376                   //Calculate the cover for this gridno
00377                   gCoverRadius[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].bCover = CalcCoverForGridNoBasedOnTeamKnownEnemies( pSoldier, sGridNo, bStance );
00378 //                gCoverRadius[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].fRoof = fRoof;
00379 
00380 
00381                   sCounterX++;
00382             }
00383             sCounterY++;
00384             sCounterX = 0;
00385       }
00386 }
00387 
00388 
00389 
00390 INT8  CalcCoverForGridNoBasedOnTeamKnownEnemies( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo, INT8 bStance )
00391 {
00392       INT32       iTotalCoverPoints=0;
00393       INT8        bNumEnemies=0;
00394       INT8        bPercentCoverForGridno=0;
00395       UINT32      uiLoop;
00396       SOLDIERTYPE *pOpponent;
00397       INT8        *pbPersOL;
00398       INT8        *pbPublOL;
00399       INT32       iGetThrough=0;
00400       INT32       iBulletGetThrough=0;
00401       INT32       iHighestValue=0;
00402       INT32       iCover=0;
00403       UINT16      usMaxRange;
00404       UINT16      usRange;
00405       UINT16      usSightLimit;
00406 
00407       //loop through all the enemies and determine the cover 
00408       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < guiNumMercSlots; uiLoop++)
00409       {
00410             pOpponent = MercSlots[ uiLoop ];
00411 
00412             // if this merc is inactive, at base, on assignment, dead, unconscious
00413             if (!pOpponent || pOpponent->bLife < OKLIFE)
00414             {
00415                   continue;          // next merc
00416             }
00417 
00418             // if this man is neutral / on the same side, he's not an opponent
00419             if( CONSIDERED_NEUTRAL( pSoldier, pOpponent ) || (pSoldier->bSide == pOpponent->bSide))
00420             {
00421                   continue;          // next merc
00422             }
00423 
00424             pbPersOL = pSoldier->bOppList + pOpponent->ubID;
00425             pbPublOL = gbPublicOpplist[ OUR_TEAM ] + pOpponent->ubID;
00426 
00427             // if this opponent is unknown personally and publicly
00428             if( *pbPersOL != SEEN_CURRENTLY && 
00429                         *pbPersOL != SEEN_THIS_TURN && 
00430                         *pbPublOL != SEEN_CURRENTLY && 
00431                         *pbPublOL != SEEN_THIS_TURN )
00432             {
00433                   continue;          // next merc
00434             }
00435 
00436             usRange = (UINT16)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pOpponent->sGridNo, sTargetGridNo );
00437         // Lesh: changed 2-nd parameter in DistanceVisible function call
00438             usSightLimit = DistanceVisible( pOpponent, (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pOpponent) ? pOpponent->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, pSoldier );
00439 
00440 
00441             if( usRange > ( usSightLimit * CELL_X_SIZE ) )
00442             {
00443                   continue;
00444             }
00445 
00446             // if actual LOS check fails, then chance to hit is 0, ignore this guy
00447             if( SoldierToVirtualSoldierLineOfSightTest( pOpponent, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, bStance, (UINT8)usSightLimit, TRUE ) == 0 )
00448             {
00449                   continue;
00450             }
00451 
00452             iGetThrough = SoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( pOpponent, sTargetGridNo, pSoldier->bLevel, bStance, NOBODY );
00453 //    iBulletGetThrough = CalcChanceToHitGun( pOpponent, sTargetGridNo, AP_MAX_AIM_ATTACK, AIM_SHOT_TORSO );
00454 
00455             if( WeaponInHand( pOpponent ) )
00456             {
00457                   usMaxRange = GunRange( &pOpponent->inv[ HANDPOS ] );
00458             }
00459             else
00460             {
00461                   usMaxRange = Weapon[ GLOCK_18 ].usRange;
00462             }
00463 
00464             iBulletGetThrough = __min( __max( (INT32)( ( ( ( ( usMaxRange - usRange ) / (FLOAT)( usMaxRange ) ) + .3 ) * 100 ) ), 0 ), 100 );
00465 
00466             if( iBulletGetThrough > 5 && iGetThrough > 0 )
00467             {
00468                   iCover = (iGetThrough * iBulletGetThrough / 100);
00469 
00470                   if( iCover > iHighestValue )
00471                         iHighestValue = iCover;
00472 
00473                   iTotalCoverPoints += iCover;
00474                   bNumEnemies++;
00475             }
00476       }
00477 
00478       if( bNumEnemies == 0 )
00479       {
00480             bPercentCoverForGridno = 100;
00481       }
00482       else
00483       {
00484             INT32 iTemp;
00485 
00486             bPercentCoverForGridno = ( iTotalCoverPoints / bNumEnemies );
00487 
00488             iTemp = bPercentCoverForGridno - ( iHighestValue / bNumEnemies );
00489 
00490             iTemp = iTemp + iHighestValue;
00491 
00492             bPercentCoverForGridno = 100 - ( __min( iTemp, 100 ) );
00493       }
00494 
00495 
00496       return( bPercentCoverForGridno );
00497 }
00498 
00499 
00500 void AddCoverObjectToWorld( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usGraphic, BOOLEAN fRoof )
00501 {
00502       LEVELNODE *pNode;
00503 
00504       if( fRoof )
00505       {
00506             AddOnRoofToHead( sGridNo, usGraphic );
00507             pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pOnRoofHead;
00508       }
00509       else
00510       {
00511             AddObjectToHead( sGridNo, usGraphic ); 
00512             pNode = gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].pObjectHead;
00513       }
00514 
00515 
00516       pNode->uiFlags |= LEVELNODE_REVEAL;
00517 
00518       if( NightTime() )
00519       {
00520             pNode->ubShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00521             pNode->ubNaturalShadeLevel=DEFAULT_SHADE_LEVEL;
00522       }
00523 }
00524 
00525 void RemoveCoverObjectFromWorld( INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usGraphic, BOOLEAN fRoof )
00526 {
00527       if( fRoof )
00528       {
00529             RemoveOnRoof( sGridNo, usGraphic );
00530       }
00531       else
00532       {
00533             RemoveObject( sGridNo, usGraphic ); 
00534       }
00535 }
00536 
00537 SOLDIERTYPE *GetCurrentMercForDisplayCover()
00538 {
00539       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier=NULL;
00540       //Get a soldier that is on the player team
00541       if( gusSelectedSoldier != NOBODY )
00542       {
00543             GetSoldier( &pSoldier, gusSelectedSoldier );
00544       }
00545       else
00546       {
00547             Assert( 0 );
00548       }
00549       return( pSoldier );
00550 }
00551 
00552 INT8 GetCurrentMercForDisplayCoverStance()
00553 {
00554       INT8  bStance;
00555       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
00556 
00557       pSoldier = GetCurrentMercForDisplayCover();
00558 
00559       switch( pSoldier->usUIMovementMode )
00560       {
00561             case PRONE:
00562             case CRAWLING:
00563                   bStance = ANIM_PRONE;
00564                   break;
00565 
00566             case KNEEL_DOWN:
00567             case SWATTING:
00568             case CROUCHING:
00569                   bStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
00570                   break;
00571 
00572             case WALKING:
00573             case RUNNING:
00574             case STANDING:
00575                   bStance = ANIM_STAND;
00576                   break;
00577 
00578             default:
00579                   bStance = ANIM_CROUCH;
00580                   break;
00581       }
00582 
00583       return( bStance );
00584 }
00585 
00586 
00587 void DisplayRangeToTarget( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo )
00588 {
00589       UINT16 usRange=0;
00590       CHAR16      zOutputString[512];
00591 
00592       if( sTargetGridNo == NOWHERE || sTargetGridNo == 0 )
00593       {
00594             return;
00595       }
00596 
00597       //Get the range to the target location
00598       usRange = GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pSoldier->sGridNo, sTargetGridNo );
00599 
00600       usRange = usRange / 10;
00601 
00602       // Snap: get target brightness:
00603       UINT8 bLightLevel = LightTrueLevel(sTargetGridNo, gsInterfaceLevel);
00604 
00605       //display a string with the range to target and target brightness (Snap)
00606       swprintf( zOutputString, zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__RANGE_TO_TARGET ], usRange, SHADE_MIN - bLightLevel, SHADE_MIN );
00607 
00608       //Display the msg
00609       ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, zOutputString );
00610 
00611       //if the soldier has a weapon in hand, display gun range and chance to hit
00612       if( WeaponInHand( pSoldier ) )
00613       {
00614             UINT32 uiHitChance;
00615             uiHitChance = CalcChanceToHitGun( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, (INT8)(pSoldier->bShownAimTime ), pSoldier->bAimShotLocation );
00616 
00617             swprintf( zOutputString, zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__GUN_RANGE_AND_CTH ], Weapon[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usRange / 10, uiHitChance );
00618 
00619             //Display the msg
00620             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, zOutputString );
00621       }
00622 
00623 
00624       //if the target is out of the mercs gun range or knife
00625       if( !InRange( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo ) && 
00626             ( Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[ pSoldier->inv[HANDPOS].usItem ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE  ) )
00627       {
00628             // Display a warning saying so
00629             ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ OUT_OF_RANGE_STRING ] );
00630       }
00631 
00632       //increment the display gun range counter ( just seeing how many times people use it )
00633       //gJa25SaveStruct.uiDisplayGunRangeCounter++;
00634 }
00635

00637 
00638 void DisplayGridNoVisibleToSoldierGrid( )
00639 {
00640       INT16 sGridNo;
00641 //    INT8  bStance;
00642 
00643       GetMouseMapPos( &sGridNo );
00644 
00645       //Only allowed in if there is someone selected
00646       if( gusSelectedSoldier == NOBODY )
00647       {
00648             return;
00649       }
00650 
00651       //if the cursor is in a the tactical map
00652       if( sGridNo != NOWHERE && sGridNo != 0 )
00653       {
00654             //if the gridno is different then the last one that was displayed
00655             if( sGridNo != gsLastVisibleToSoldierGridNo || MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->sGridNo != gsLastSoldierGridNo )
00656             {
00657                   //if the cover is currently being displayed
00658                   if( gsLastVisibleToSoldierGridNo != NOWHERE || gsLastSoldierGridNo != NOWHERE )
00659                   {
00660                         //remove the gridnos
00661                         RemoveVisibleGridNoAtSelectedGridNo();
00662                   }
00663                   else
00664                   {
00665 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00666                         {
00667                               CHAR16      zString[512];
00668                               swprintf( zString, L"%s, (%d)", zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__LOS ], gGameSettings.ubSizeOfLOS );
00669                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, zString );
00670                         }
00671 #else
00672                         //pop up a message to say we are in the display cover routine
00673                         ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__LOS ] );
00674 #endif
00675                         //increment the display LOS counter ( just seeing how many times people use it )
00676                         //gJa25SaveStruct.uiDisplayLosCounter++;
00677                   }
00678 
00679                   gsLastVisibleToSoldierGridNo = sGridNo;
00680                   gsLastSoldierGridNo = MercPtrs[ gusSelectedSoldier ]->sGridNo;
00681 
00682 
00683                   //Fill the array of gridno and cover values
00684                   CalculateVisibleToSoldierAroundGridno( sGridNo, gGameSettings.ubSizeOfLOS );
00685 
00686                   //Add the graphics to each gridno
00687                   AddVisibleToSoldierToEachGridNo();
00688 
00689                   // Re-render the scene!
00690                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00691             }
00692       }
00693 }
00694 
00695 
00696 void CalculateVisibleToSoldierAroundGridno( INT16 sTargetGridNo, INT8 bSearchRange )
00697 {
00698       INT16 sMaxLeft, sMaxRight, sMaxUp, sMaxDown, sXOffset, sYOffset;
00699       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier=NULL;
00700       INT16 sGridNo;
00701       INT16 sCounterX, sCounterY;
00702       BOOLEAN     fRoof=FALSE;
00703 
00704       //clear out the struct
00705       memset( gVisibleToSoldierStruct, 0, sizeof( VISIBLE_TO_SOLDIER_STRUCT ) * DC__SOLDIER_VISIBLE_RANGE * DC__SOLDIER_VISIBLE_RANGE );
00706 
00707       if( bSearchRange > ( DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE / 2 ) )
00708             bSearchRange = ( DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE / 2 );
00709 
00710 
00711       // determine maximum horizontal limits
00712       sMaxLeft  = min( bSearchRange,( sTargetGridNo % MAXCOL ));
00713       sMaxRight = min( bSearchRange,MAXCOL - (( sTargetGridNo % MAXCOL ) + 1));
00714 
00715       // determine maximum vertical limits
00716       sMaxUp   = min( bSearchRange,( sTargetGridNo / MAXROW ));
00717       sMaxDown = min( bSearchRange,MAXROW - (( sTargetGridNo / MAXROW ) + 1));
00718 
00719       pSoldier = GetCurrentMercForDisplayCover();
00720 
00721       sCounterX=0;
00722       sCounterY=0;
00723 
00724       //loop through all the gridnos that we are interested in
00725       for (sYOffset = -sMaxUp; sYOffset <= sMaxDown; sYOffset++)
00726       {
00727             sCounterX = 0;
00728             for (sXOffset = -sMaxLeft; sXOffset <= sMaxRight; sXOffset++)
00729             {
00730                   sGridNo = sTargetGridNo + sXOffset + (MAXCOL * sYOffset);
00731                   fRoof = FALSE;
00732 
00733                   //record the gridno
00734                   gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].sGridNo = sGridNo;    
00735 
00736                   //if the gridno is NOT on screen
00737                   if( !GridNoOnScreen( sGridNo ) )
00738                   {
00739                         continue;
00740                   }
00741 
00742                   //is there a roof above this gridno
00743                   if( FlatRoofAboveGridNo( sGridNo ) )
00744                   {
00745                         if( IsTheRoofVisible( sGridNo ) && gbWorldSectorZ == 0 )
00746                         {
00747                               fRoof = TRUE;
00748                         }
00749 
00750                         //if wer havent explored the area yet and we are underground, dont show cover
00751                         else if( !( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED ) && gbWorldSectorZ != 0 )
00752                         {
00753                               continue;
00754                         }
00755                   }
00756 
00757 /*                
00758                   //if we are to display cover for the roofs, and there is a roof above us
00759                   if( gsInterfaceLevel == I_ROOF_LEVEL && !FlatRoofAboveGridNo( sGridNo ) )
00760                   {
00761                         continue;
00762                   }
00763 */
00764 /*
00765                   // if someone (visible) is there, skip
00766                   //Check both bottom level, and top level
00767                   ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 0 );
00768                   if( ubID == NOBODY )
00769                   {
00770                         ubID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, 1 );
00771                   }
00772                   //if someone is here, and they are an enemy, skip over them
00773                   if ( ubID != NOBODY && Menptr[ ubID ].bVisible == TRUE && Menptr[ ubID ].bTeam != pSoldier->bTeam )
00774                   {
00775                         continue;
00776                   }
00777 
00778                   //Calculate the cover for this gridno
00779                   gCoverRadius[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].bCover = CalcCoverForGridNoBasedOnTeamKnownEnemies( pSoldier, sGridNo, bStance );
00780 */
00781 
00782                   gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].bVisibleToSoldier = CalcIfSoldierCanSeeGridNo( pSoldier, sGridNo, fRoof );
00783                   gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ sCounterX ][ sCounterY ].fRoof = fRoof;
00784                   sCounterX++;
00785             }
00786 
00787             sCounterY++;
00788       }
00789 }
00790 
00791 
00792 void AddVisibleToSoldierToEachGridNo()
00793 {
00794       UINT32 uiCntX, uiCntY;
00795       INT8  bVisibleToSoldier=0;
00796       BOOLEAN fRoof;
00797       INT16 sGridNo;
00798 
00799       //loop through all the gridnos
00800       for(uiCntY=0; uiCntY<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntY++)
00801       {
00802             for(uiCntX=0; uiCntX<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntX++)
00803             {
00804                   bVisibleToSoldier = gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bVisibleToSoldier;
00805                   if( bVisibleToSoldier == -1 )
00806                   {
00807                         continue;
00808                   }
00809 
00810                   fRoof = gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].fRoof;
00811                   sGridNo = gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo;
00812 
00813                   //if the soldier can easily see this gridno.  Can see all 3 positions
00814                   if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_3_STANCE )
00815                   {
00816                         AddCoverObjectToWorld( sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_5, fRoof );
00817                   }
00818 
00819                   //cant see a thing
00820                   else if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_NO_STANCES )
00821                   {
00822                         AddCoverObjectToWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_1, fRoof );
00823                   }
00824 
00825                   //can only see prone
00826                   else if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_1_STANCE )
00827                   {
00828                         AddCoverObjectToWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_2, fRoof );
00829                   }
00830 
00831                   //can see crouch or prone
00832                   else if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_2_STANCE )
00833                   {
00834                         AddCoverObjectToWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_3, fRoof );
00835                   }
00836 
00837                   else
00838                   {
00839                         Assert( 0 );
00840                   }
00841             }
00842       }
00843 }
00844 
00845 
00846 void RemoveVisibleGridNoAtSelectedGridNo()
00847 {
00848       UINT32 uiCntX, uiCntY;
00849       INT8  bVisibleToSoldier;
00850       INT16 sGridNo;
00851       BOOLEAN fRoof;
00852 
00853       //make sure to only remove it when its right
00854       if( gsLastVisibleToSoldierGridNo == NOWHERE )
00855       {
00856             return;
00857       }
00858 
00859       //loop through all the gridnos
00860       for(uiCntY=0; uiCntY<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntY++)
00861       {
00862             for(uiCntX=0; uiCntX<DC_MAX_COVER_RANGE ;uiCntX++)
00863             {
00864                   bVisibleToSoldier = gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].bVisibleToSoldier;
00865                   fRoof = gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].fRoof;
00866                   sGridNo = gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo;
00867 
00868                   //if there is a valid cover at this gridno
00869                   if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_3_STANCE )
00870                   {
00871                         RemoveCoverObjectFromWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_5, fRoof );
00872                   }
00873 
00874                   //cant see a thing
00875                   else if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_NO_STANCES )
00876                   {
00877                         RemoveCoverObjectFromWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_1, fRoof );
00878                   }
00879 
00880                   //can only see prone
00881                   else if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_1_STANCE )
00882                   {
00883                         RemoveCoverObjectFromWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_2, fRoof );
00884                   }
00885 
00886                   //can see crouch or prone
00887                   else if( bVisibleToSoldier == DC__SEE_2_STANCE )
00888                   {
00889                         RemoveCoverObjectFromWorld( gVisibleToSoldierStruct[ uiCntX ][ uiCntY ].sGridNo, SPECIALTILE_COVER_3, fRoof );
00890                   }
00891 
00892                   else
00893                   {
00894                         Assert( 0 );
00895                   }
00896             }
00897       }
00898 
00899       // Re-render the scene!
00900       SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
00901             
00902       gsLastVisibleToSoldierGridNo = NOWHERE;               
00903       gsLastSoldierGridNo = NOWHERE;
00904 }
00905 
00906 
00907 INT8 CalcIfSoldierCanSeeGridNo( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sTargetGridNo, BOOLEAN fRoof )
00908 {
00909       INT8  bRetVal=0;
00910       INT32 iLosForGridNo=0;
00911       UINT16      usSightLimit=0;
00912       INT8  *pPersOL,*pbPublOL;
00913       UINT8 ubID;
00914       BOOLEAN     bAware=FALSE;
00915 
00916       if( fRoof )
00917       {
00918             ubID = WhoIsThere2( sTargetGridNo, 1 );
00919       }
00920       else
00921       {
00922             ubID = WhoIsThere2( sTargetGridNo, 0 );
00923       }
00924 
00925       if( ubID != NOBODY )
00926       {
00927             pPersOL = &(pSoldier->bOppList[ubID]);
00928             pbPublOL = &(gbPublicOpplist[pSoldier->bTeam][ubID]);
00929 
00930              // if soldier is known about (SEEN or HEARD within last few turns)
00931             if (*pPersOL || *pbPublOL)
00932             {
00933                    bAware = TRUE;
00934             }
00935       }
00936 
00937     // Lesh: changed 2-nd parameter in DistanceVisible function call
00938       usSightLimit = DistanceVisible( pSoldier, (SoldierHasLimitedVision(pSoldier) ? pSoldier->bDesiredDirection : DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT), DIRECTION_IRRELEVANT, sTargetGridNo, fRoof, pSoldier );
00939 
00940 
00941       //
00942       // Prone
00943       //
00944       iLosForGridNo = SoldierToVirtualSoldierLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fRoof, ANIM_PRONE, (UINT8)usSightLimit, bAware );
00945       if( iLosForGridNo != 0 )
00946       {
00947             bRetVal++;
00948       }
00949 
00950       //
00951       // Crouch
00952       //
00953       iLosForGridNo = SoldierToVirtualSoldierLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fRoof, ANIM_CROUCH, (UINT8)usSightLimit, bAware );
00954       if( iLosForGridNo != 0 )
00955       {
00956             bRetVal++;
00957       }
00958 
00959       //
00960       // Standing
00961       //
00962       iLosForGridNo = SoldierToVirtualSoldierLineOfSightTest( pSoldier, sTargetGridNo, fRoof, ANIM_STAND, (UINT8)usSightLimit, bAware );
00963       if( iLosForGridNo != 0 )
00964       {
00965             bRetVal++;
00966       }
00967 
00968       return( bRetVal );
00969 }
00970 
00971 BOOLEAN IsTheRoofVisible( INT16 sGridNo )
00972 {
00973       UINT8 ubRoom;
00974 
00975       if( InARoom( sGridNo, &ubRoom ) )
00976       {
00977             if( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].uiFlags & MAPELEMENT_REVEALED )
00978             {
00979                   if( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & SHOW_ALL_ROOFS )
00980                         return( TRUE );
00981                   else
00982                         return( FALSE );
00983             }
00984             else
00985             {
00986                   return( TRUE );
00987             }
00988       }
00989 
00990       return( FALSE );
00991 }

01010 
01011 void ChangeSizeOfDisplayCover( INT32 iNewSize )
01012 {
01013       //if the new size is smaller or greater, scale it
01014       if( iNewSize < DC__MIN_SIZE )
01015       {
01016             iNewSize = DC__MIN_SIZE;
01017       }
01018       else if( iNewSize > DC__MAX_SIZE )
01019       {
01020             iNewSize = DC__MAX_SIZE;
01021       }
01022 
01023       //Set new size
01024       gGameSettings.ubSizeOfDisplayCover = (UINT8)iNewSize;
01025 
01026       //redisplay the cover
01027       RemoveCoverOfSelectedGridNo();
01028       DisplayCoverOfSelectedGridNo( );
01029 }
01030 
01031 void ChangeSizeOfLOS( INT32 iNewSize )
01032 {
01033       //if the new size is smaller or greater, scale it
01034       if( iNewSize < DC__MIN_SIZE )
01035       {
01036             iNewSize = DC__MIN_SIZE;
01037       }
01038       else if( iNewSize > DC__MAX_SIZE )
01039       {
01040             iNewSize = DC__MAX_SIZE;
01041       }
01042 
01043       //Set new size
01044       gGameSettings.ubSizeOfLOS = (UINT8)iNewSize;
01045 
01046       //ReDisplay the los
01047       RemoveVisibleGridNoAtSelectedGridNo();
01048       DisplayGridNoVisibleToSoldierGrid( );
01049 }
